msg: Convert SVN::Pool to pool for h2i generated interface in perl bindings.

author: philip
msg: Fix a bug reported by "Steve Dwire" <sdwire@pcsigroup.com>.  Update
in an incomplete directory needs to handle directory entries where the
incomplete report a missing directory should not be reported.

author: cmpilato
msg: Miscellaneous bug fixes for streamy status.
(make_dir_baton): Don't handle subdirectories if we're not recursing
and we're in the anchor directory.
(delete_entry): Fix a logic test horked during a variable re-org.
(close_edit): Don't go off doing statuses on the anchor when there's
(close_directory): Update call to handle_statii(), and be aware of
the state of descendedness.  Also, fix a logic test horked
